author: Peerzada Ashiq
text:
He blames BJP and RSS men for the incident

Firebrand MLA Engineer Rashid was thrashed and his car attacked with stones on Saturday in Rajouri district of Jammu and Kashmir. However, he escaped unhurt.

“When we reached the Bhamla area of Rajouri district, some BJP and RSS goons attacked my vehicle with stones and dragged me out,” said Mr. Rashid. “They shouted slogans ‘Bharat Mai Rehna Hai, Ram Ram Kehna Hai, Pakistan Murdabad’,” alleged Mr. Rashid.

The MLA was on the way to attend his party meeting in the Pir Panchal area of the Jammu region.

“The police acted as mute spectators and didn’t stop the Hindutva terrorists,” alleged Mr. Rashid.

The attack comes at a time when the PDP reportedly asked the coalition partner BJP to rein in its supporters from “encouraging any polarisation of the State on religious lines.”

Sources said the PDP, which is re-engaging the BJP over the government formation, is expressed unhappiness over the coalition partner’s judicial activism over the issues like beef ban and State flag.

In the past too, Mr. Rashid came under attack in the Jammu region for his attempt to expand into the Muslim belts.
title: J&K MLA Engineer Rashid attacked, blames BJP
